title: Is the Ohio P.D. Pepper Spray from Amboti Brewster?
subtitle: The police ' s brutal allegations during the June 2020 anti-racism rally included rumours that officers had forcibly removed the dual limbs of the industry.

vclaim: The police sprayed peppers twice and removed his artificial legs during June 21, 2020 in protest against police brutality in Columbus, Ohio.
